aboutPage.title: About Boostify
aboutPage.description: We're on a mission to revolutionize eCommerce by making AI-powered tools accessible to merchants of all sizes. Since our founding, we've helped thousands of businesses scale and succeed.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Boostify was born from a simple observation: eCommerce merchants were spending too much time on repetitive tasks and not enough time growing their businesses. We set out to change that.
story.paragraph2: Founded in 2020, we've grown from a small team of passionate developers to a global platform serving over 10,000 merchants worldwide. Our AI-powered solutions have helped businesses recover millions in lost sales and increase conversion rates by an average of 35%.
story.paragraph3: Today, we continue to innovate, bringing cutting-edge AI technology to merchants who want to sell smarter and grow faster. Our platform combines powerful automation, intelligent analytics, and personalized AI assistance to give you everything you need to succeed.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: At Kamalfy, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform.

information.title: Information We Collect
information.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including account information, payment details, and content you create. We also automatically collect certain information about your device and how you interact with our services.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, send communications, and personalize your experience.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with service providers who assist us in operating our platform, or when required by law.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You may also opt-out of certain communications from us.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our platform and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@kamalfy.com

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.introduction: These Terms of Service govern your access to and use of Kamalfy's platform and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Kamalfy, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.

account.title: Account Registration
account.content: You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and password.

use.title: Use of Services
use.content: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You may not use our services to transmit any harmful or illegal content.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: Subscription fees are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis. All fees are non-refundable except as required by law or as stated in our Refund Policy.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content, features, and functionality of the platform are owned by Kamalfy and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: Kamalfy shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of the platform.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes via email or through the platform.

refundPolicy.title: Refund Policy
refundPolicy.introduction: At Kamalfy, we want you to be completely satisfied with our services. This Refund Policy outlines the terms and conditions for refunds.

eligibility.title: Refund Eligibility
eligibility.content: You may request a full refund within 30 days of your initial purchase or subscription renewal. Refund requests must be submitted through our support system.

process.title: Refund Process
process.content: To request a refund, contact our support team with your account details and reason for the refund. We will process your request within 5-7 business days.

exceptions.title: Non-Refundable Items
exceptions.content: Refunds are not available for add-on services, custom development work, or services that have been used beyond the trial period without a valid reason.

processing.title: Refund Processing Time
processing.content: Once approved, refunds will be processed to your original payment method within 10-14 business days, depending on your payment provider.

cancellation.title: Subscription Cancellation
cancellation.content: You may cancel your subscription at any time. Cancellation will take effect at the end of your current billing period. No refunds are provided for partial billing periods.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For refund requests or questions about this policy, please contact us at support@kamalfy.com

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.introduction: This Cookie Policy explains how Kamalfy uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our platform.

what.title: What Are Cookies
what.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to site owners.

how.title: How We Use Cookies
how.content: We use cookies to authenticate users, remember your preferences, analyze site traffic, and improve our services. We also use cookies for marketing and advertising purposes.

types.title: Types of Cookies We Use
types.content: We use essential cookies (required for site functionality), performance cookies (to analyze site usage), functionality cookies (to remember your preferences), and targeting cookies (for advertising).

third.title: Third-Party Cookies
third.content: We may also use third-party cookies from trusted partners for analytics, advertising, and social media integration. These cookies are subject to the respective third parties' privacy policies.

control.title: Cookie Control
control.content: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our platform.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. We encourage you to review this page periodically for any changes.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.introduction: The information on this website is provided on an 'as is' basis. To the fullest extent permitted by law, Kamalfy excludes all representations, warranties, and conditions relating to our website and the use of this website.

accuracy.title: Information Accuracy
accuracy.content: While we strive to keep the information on our platform accurate and up-to-date, we make no representations or warranties of any kind about the completeness, accuracy, or reliability of any information on the platform.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Kamalfy will not be liable for any loss or damage including without limitation, indirect or consequential loss or damage, arising from the use of our platform or services.

external.title: External Links
external.content: Our platform may contain links to external websites. We are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of these external sites.

ai.title: AI-Generated Content
ai.content: Some features of our platform use AI to generate content. While we strive for accuracy, AI-generated content may contain errors and should be reviewed before use.

availability.title: Service Availability
availability.content: We do not guarantee that our services will be available at all times. We may experience downtime due to maintenance, updates, or unforeseen circumstances.

advice.title: No Professional Advice
advice.content: The information provided on our platform is for general informational purposes only and should not be considered as professional, legal, or financial advice.

changes.title: Changes to Services
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of our services at any time without prior notice.
